title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.02 - Design of Regulatory Signs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.02 - Design of Regulatory Signs

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Standard: 03A Any change to a word message sign that can be
considered more than a minor modification (see Section
1A.03
) shall be approved by the

New York State Department of Transportation before it is
implemented. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2B.02

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
